section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by temporary legislation that will expire on February 4, 2022.*
section.heading: Definitions.

para.text: For the purposes of this subchapter, the term:
For an assignment for which the Council is the receiving agency, the personnel authority to whom the employee will be assigned in consultation with the Chairman of the Council.
For an assignment for which the Council is the sending agency, the personnel authority to whom the employee is currently assigned.

section.codify:annotation: For temporary (225 days) creation of this section, see § 906 of the Coronavirus Support Temporary Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Law 24-9, June 7, 2021, 68 DCR 4824).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 906 of the Coronavirus Support Emergency Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-30, March 17, 2021, 68 DCR 3101).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 906 of the Coronavirus Support Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Law 24-9, June 7, 2021, 68 DCR 6025).
